figure_1.title: Fig. 1.
figure_1.caption:
Flow chart of data collection and cleaning process.

figure_2.title: Fig. 2.

The overall network of weight control keywords.
BMI, body mass index.

claims.sentence:
Data collection and cleaning
The data collection and cleaning process in presented in Fig. 1.

The structural form of the network
The network structure was analyzed focusing on the top 50 keywords by frequency, and visualized using NetDraw as shown in Fig. 2.
